content.text:
# Moortown (ward)

| party1      = Labour
| councillor2 = Sharon Hamilton
| party2      = Labour
| councillor3 = Mohammed Shahzad
| party3      = Labour
| population     = 17,363
| population_ref = (2023 electorate)
| area_total_km2 =
| area_footnotes =
| hide_services = yes
}}
Moortown is an electoral ward of Leeds City Council in north Leeds, West Yorkshire, covering the suburb of the same name, Meanwood and the southern part of Moor Allerton below the Leeds Outer Ring Road.
Councillors since 1973
represented Moortown ward (2012-2018). Member of Parliament for Leeds North West since 2017.]]
